title: Secure Software Development: Implementation (LFD105)
overview: This course covers the implementation phase of the secure software development lifecycle. Learners will explore secure coding practices, methods for handling input validation, authentication, access control, cryptography, and error handling. It provides practical techniques to help developers prevent common vulnerabilities during the implementation stage.
audience: This course is ideal for developers, software engineers, and security-focused team members who want to improve their ability to implement secure code and practices during the development process.

details.certificate: Digital Badge and Certificate of Completion
